backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles and per-user surgery cases with access control, creation, retrieval, and update logic plus data type definitions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app coordinating authentication, backend connection, profile setup, case management UI, and sync tools.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Camera capture component using a custom hook to start, stop, and capture photos with error handling and UI controls.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case card with patient demographics, arrival info, tasks checklist, and edit handling with local/server sync.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating or editing a surgery case, supporting prefill logic, demographic entry, and task configuration.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Shows a sortable list of case cards, with loading and empty states.
Reusable date input with manual entry and popup calendar selection.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Textarea for quick demographics input with optional camera capture dialog.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Sort field selector and toggle button for ascending/descending sort order.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Renders required tasks with checkboxes and notifies parent on toggle.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all cases to a CSV file and triggers a download.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: Dialog for uploading a CSV, previewing parse results, and importing cases.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays footer with dynamic year and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders the app header and handles login/logout using Internet Identity, clearing local data and queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: Displays online, backend, and sync status with retry and sync actions, showing relevant errors for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
Probes backend connectivity using the actor and provides connection status, errors, and a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Manages local and server surgery cases with merging, normalization, and mutations for adding and updating cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity state and login/logout flow via Internet Identity, exposing status flags through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using event listeners and returns a boolean value.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and surgery cases via the backend actor with authorization handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Provides a sync function that merges local and server surgery cases, normalizes data, updates storage, and handles errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying global defaults.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Type definitions for local surgery cases and form data, extending backend types with local-only fields.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: CSV utilities for exporting cases to CSV and parsing CSV input with validation and warnings.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Date-only utilities for validation, formatting, and conversion to and from nanoseconds without timezone issues.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: LocalStorage helpers for saving, loading, normalizing, and clearing locally stored surgery cases and sync timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Functions to merge local and server surgery cases and prepare pending local changes for backend sync.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Provides MRN-based lookup for the latest matching case and extracts demographic fields for prefill.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and utilities to create, normalize, query, and update a 7â€‘item tasks checklist.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project version, features, issues, and architectural notes for the veterinary surgery case app.
